sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO discussion (discussion_id, interHash, hash, parent_hash, type, user_name, text, rating, anonym, date) VALUES (#review.id#, #interHash#, #review.hash#, #review.parentHash#, #discussionItemType.id#, #userName#, #review.text#, #review.rating#, #review.anonym#, #review.date#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE discussion SET text = #review.text#, rating = #review.rating#, anonym = #review.anonym#, hash = #review.hash#, change_date = #review.changeDate# WHERE user_name = #userName# AND interHash = #interHash# AND rating IS NOT NULL
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO review_ratings_cache (interHash, number_of_ratings, rating_arithmetic_mean) VALUES (#interHash#, 1 , #review.rating#) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE rating_arithmetic_mean = (rating_arithmetic_mean * number_of_ratings + #review.rating#)/(number_of_ratings + 1), number_of_ratings = number_of_ratings + 1;
sqlMap.update: UPDATE review_ratings_cache SET rating_arithmetic_mean = COALESCE((rating_arithmetic_mean * number_of_ratings - #review.rating#)/(number_of_ratings - 1), 0), number_of_ratings = number_of_ratings - 1 WHERE interHash = #interHash#
